description: This meta shows you how to create an otp

spec.length: This is Integer length you want for the OTP.
spec.customer: This is an object with the name, email and phone number of the customer.
spec.sender: This is your merchant/business name. It would display when the OTP is sent.
spec.send: Set to true to send otp to customer
spec.medium: Pass the medium you want your customers to receive the OTP on. Possible values are sms, email and whatsapp you can pass more than one medium in the array
spec.expiry: Pass an integer value represented in minutes for how long you want the OTP to live for before expiring.
